short_summary: The Company is seeking a service provider in website maintenance, management, and development services for proper functioning of websites and their content management systems.
description: Detailed description of the services and everything mentioned in the document.
full_summary:
### Contract Notice: Website Maintenance, Management, and Development Services
#### (Amendment 3)

**Notice Details**

* Reference Number: PW-23-01020620
* Solicitation Number: CLC - COM - 1122
* Publication Date: 2023-01-10
* Tender Closing Date and Time: 2023-02-13T16:00:00
* Amendment Date: 2023-01-27
* Procurement Category: Service (SRV)

**Procurement Overview**
The Canada Lands Company CLC Limited is seeking a service provider to deliver website maintenance, management, and development services. The successful vendor will be responsible for ensuring the proper functioning, well-being, and continuous improvement of the company's websites and content management systems.

**Key Requirements**

* Website maintenance, management, and development services
* Support for web application development and ad-hoc website services for Drupal and WordPress-based websites
* Content management system support

**Contract Details**

* Regions of Opportunity: Ontario (except NCR)
* Regions of Delivery: Canada
* Expected Contract Start Date: None
* Expected Contract End Date: None

**Eligibility**
The tender is open to all eligible Canadian businesses. The Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) applies to this procurement.

**Additional Information**

* Tender documents and instructions are available for download at the below links:
	+ [Link to English RFP document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/10/c4ed4f8767fdc0e02813bbcc992eba51/22-1224_request_for_proposals_-_website_management_-_english_-_final_final-s.pdf)
	+ [Link to French RFP document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/10/624095d5c0f372ed6fdc2eb8a2d1f923/22-1224_request_for_proposals_-_website_management_-_french_-_final_final-s.pdf)
* Contact Information:
	+ Name: Rev. Brifkani
	+ Email: [rbrifkani@clc-sic.ca](mailto:rbrifkani@clc-sic.ca)
	+ Address: 1 University Avenue, Suite 1700, Toronto, ON M5J 2P1, Canada
	+ Phone: None
	+ Fax: None
